connectionSettings.intro: Select which user roles can create connections and manage connection permissions for this tenant.

formSettings.accessCheckbox: Allow only authenticated users to access forms
formSettings.accessExplanation: When selected, only authenticated users of this tenant can access forms.  This setting only applies to new start and task forms you configure in your workflows. Existing start or task forms that are configured to allow access to anyone with the URL are not affected by this setting and must be updated manually.

cssDescription.message: Enable custom CSS to be added to a form. Please read the {link} before any forms are published with custom CSS code.

cssTncText.message: By enabling this feature, I acknowledge the {link} applicable to use of custom CSS code (the "Feature"); I understand that the Feature is not required and that opting to apply the Feature involves acceptance of potential risks, such as incompatibility with future upgrades, interfering or conflicting with accessibility of the Forms or Nintex's platform, and is excluded from Nintex's support services.

formSettings.cssDisableDialogWarningText: Disabling this feature will prevent existing custom CSS in a form from being changed, and will remove custom CSS when the form is published. This may break the layout of the form. This setting does not affect already published forms.
formSettings.cssDisableDialogWarningTextP2: Are you sure you want to disable custom CSS?

tenantExpiry.expiredSubscriptionTooltip: Your subscription has expired. You will be unable to modify or run workflows. You can renew your subscription by contacting sales@nintex.com.
tenantExpiry.expiredTrialTooltip: Your trial has expired. You will be unable to modify or run workflows. You can obtain a paid subscription by contacting sales@nintex.com.

subscriptions.usageDetailsDesc1: View your tenant's usage on Customer Central.
subscriptions.usageDetailsDesc2: Customer Central is a self-service portal where you can create and view support cases; access the Upgrade Center; and view licence keys, contracts, product usage, and more.
subscriptions.customBrandingDescription:
Customise the look of this tenant by adding a company logo and increase the familiarity for users.

Brand header logo guidelines:

  • Use PNG or JPG image format
  • Icon will be displayed at a maximum height of 34 pixels within the header
  • A landscape sized logo will present better within the allocated space
  • Be mindful of colour contrast, Nintex recommends using a white logos with transparent backgrounds. Use an opaque background when color contrast is an issue

connector-availability.intro-1: Show or hide connectors in the tenant.
connector-availability.intro-2: Please note: Any published workflows using connectors that are turned off will continue to run.

connector-sorting.intro: Drag connectors to set their position in the toolbox and in the list of start events.

workflowPermissions.info: Owners can assign workflow permissions, and access workflows and associated workflow tasks and instances. Note that users with the Administrator role also have the same workflow permissions.

workflowPermissions.ownersInfo: Owners can assign workflow permissions, and access workflows, associated workflow tasks and instances. Note that users with the Administrator role also have the same workflow permissions.

defaultEfss.name: Name

defaultEfss.deprecationMessageFlag: Default file storage will be deprecated soon. Update workflows that interact with your default file storage location, and then disable or delete your default file storage configuration.

componentWorkflowTokens.regenerateContent: Regenerating a token replaces the active token, which will expire in 24 hours. Ensure to update any external workflows or applications with the regenerated token. Regenerate token?

integrations.spoPanelDescription:
SharePoint Online integrations allows users to access this Nintex Automation Cloud tenant from SharePoint Online.
  • Only add one integration of type of 'Tenant' with the root SharePoint URL (e.g. https://mytenant.sharepoint.com) if you want all users to be directed to this tenant.
  • Add multiple integrations if you want to integrate specific sites and site collections with this tenant.
integrations.deleteNotification: Deleting this integration will disconnect this Nintex Automation Cloud tenant from the associated SharePoint Online tenant. Are you sure you want to delete this integration?

accessLevel.label: SharePoint Online site type
accessLevel.tenant:
Tenant: integrates the entire specified SharePoint Online tenant with this Nintex Automation Cloud tenant.
Example: https://mytenant.sharepoint.com
accessLevel.site:
Site: only integrates the specified site with this Nintex Automation Cloud tenant.
Example: https://mytenant.sharepoint.com/sitecollection/site/
accessLevel.siteCollection:
Site collection: only integrates the specified site collection with this Nintex Automation Cloud tenant.
Example: https://mytenant.sharepoint.com/sitecollection/

integrations.allowDesignerToChooseO365: Allow user to select Nintex Automation for Office 365
integrations.allowDesignerToChooseO365Checkbox: Allow user to select Nintex Automation for Office 365 (only applicable for an existing Nintex Automation for Office 365 tenant)
integrations.deleteIntegrationGenericError: Unable to delete the integration. Please try again
integrations.editIntegrationGenericError: Unable to edit the integration. Please try again

formAttachmentStorage.description: Files uploaded to submitted workflow start event forms or task forms will either be retained in Automation Cloud, or removed 7 days after the workflow instance is completed. In My Nintex, users with the participant role can see files they have submitted via start forms and task forms. If the relevant My Nintex settings are enabled for a workflow, users can also see the files of other form submissions for instances of workflows they have interacted with. See the File upload storage help topic.

retentionType.label: Store file uploads:
retentionType.instanceCompletion: For 7 days after workflow instances complete
